title: Petz Social Media
description: A web app for sharing and exploring pet moments. Connect with fellow pet owners by posting photos, updates, and stories about your pets. View your personalized feed of pet posts, see user profiles, and engage by commenting on and liking posts.

title: The Cookbook
description: A web app for collecting and exploring new recipes. Save, update and delete your personal recipes. Have a taste for something new? Look for new recipes, choose and save the one that suits you best.
